p.i: This resource is a draft proposal for use as part of an approach to Clinical Quality within FHIR, and is documented as part of the Clinical Reasoning module.

div.p: The GuidanceResponse resource is used to represent the result of invoking a decision support service. It provides a container for the status of the response, any warnings or messages returned by the service, as well as the output data of the module and any suggested actions to be performed.
For a detailed discussion of the evaluation process, refer to the Guidance Request topic in the Clinical Reasoning module.
